title: Application Credentials
description: Authentication credentials for external services. Supports both user credentials (stored in browser) and system credentials (loaded from environment variables).

name.title: Repository Name
name.description: Unique identifier and repository name on GitHub (e.g., 'nous-conversion', 'dagnet')

isDefault.title: Default Repository
isDefault.description: Mark this as the default repository to load on startup

userName.title: User Name
userName.description: Display name for file authorship (used in metadata.author field)

token.title: GitHub Token
token.description: Personal access token for GitHub API

basePath.title: Base Path
basePath.description: Optional prefix for directory structure (e.g., 'param-registry' for nested repos)

branch.title: Default Branch
branch.description: Default branch to use for operations

graphsPath.title: Graphs Directory Path
graphsPath.description: Path to the graphs directory in the repository

paramsPath.title: Parameters Directory Path
paramsPath.description: Path to the parameters directory in the repository

contextsPath.title: Contexts Directory Path
contextsPath.description: Path to the contexts directory in the repository

casesPath.title: Cases Directory Path
casesPath.description: Path to the cases directory in the repository

nodesPath.title: Nodes Directory Path
nodesPath.description: Path to the nodes directory in the repository

token.title: Statsig API Key
token.description: Console API key for Statsig (full CRUD operations)

googleSheets.title: Google Sheets Credentials
googleSheets.description: Authentication credentials for Google Sheets integration

token.title: Google OAuth Token
token.description: OAuth access token for Google Sheets API
